title: Urf
body: I think riot should put back urf and leave it there because that is the best mode with unlimited power and you never know what will happen! And I think Riot should give every new player to league to have that chance to play that mode

replies.body: I know everyone loves urf but you are all acting like children riot could replace ranked with urf and you would all be happy till you got bored of it
I'd rather not have people spam URF for 8 hours a day then join my SoloQ games and have no idea what they're doing.
